channel.title: (PI) Making character teleblocked on spawn etc
channel.description:
I have a npc that you choose an option of which side to go that being varrock/fally, how would i edit in to make your character teleblocked when it's created, so they can't tele off normally without choosing a side, then the npc would set the player as un teleblocked? is it possible?
thanks, jeddac :)
